author: Joe Skrebels
description: It might have been canned, but Microsoft still wants the name, for some reason.
title: Microsoft Renews Trademark for Cancelled Game Scalebound - IGN

description: Few places in the world are as dynamic and diverse as Africa today. In this landscape, we see enormous opportunity for the cloud to accelerate innovation, support people across the continent who are working to transform their businesses, explore new entrepreneurship opportunities and help solve some of the world’s hardest problems. For these reasons, I’m very excited to share our plans to deliver the Microsoft Cloud from datacenters in Africa. … Read more »
title: Microsoft to deliver Microsoft Cloud from datacenters in Africa - The Official Microsoft Blog

author: Napier Lopez
description: Microsoft's next Surface event is happening on Monday, where it's rumored to be announcing an update to its Surface Pro line. But a fresh batch of leaks is giving us an early look ...
title: Microsoft’s new Surface Pro just leaked, but it’s not a ‘Pro 5’

author: Thomas Ricker
description: Everyone's favorite purveyor of previews @evleaks just dropped a bundle of photos purportedly showing the followup to Microsoft's Surface Pro 4. Now called the "Surface Pro" (sans number),...
title: New Surface Pro leak confirms Microsoft's hatred for USB-C

author: Jörn Brien
description: Nach sieben Jahren hat Microsoft endlich ein Problem gelöst, das sicher Millionen E-Mail-Nutzer genervt hat. Ein Smiley erscheint jetzt auch als Smiley und nicht als „J“. Wir sagen euch, warum.
title: Endlich Smiley statt J: Microsoft repariert Emoji-Bug nach sieben Jahren

author: Andreas Floemer
description: Am 23. Mai wird Microsoft ein Surface-Event veranstalten. Der Softwareriese wird aber wohl kein Surface Pro 5 enthüllen, sondern ein Refresh des Surface Pro 4. Erste Details sind jetzt geleakt.
title: Microsoft Surface Pro 4 Refresh kommt Ende Mai – so sieht es aus

author: FOCUS Online
description: In E-Mails bei Outlook taucht es immer wieder auf: Ein ungewöhnliches "J", das am Ende eines Satzes steht. Wer sich schon immer gefragt hat, woher der Buchstabe kommt, kriegt nun eine Antwort. Denn Microsoft will das Problem endlich beheben.
title: Jeder kennt es: Microsoft löst endlich ein Mail-Problem, das Sie seit Jahren nervt

author: Seth G. Macy
description: Microsoft's online service is more than just multiplayer gaming.
title: The Best Xbox Live Gold Deal - IGN

author: Anita Balakrishnan
description: In the quest to make the perfect chewy candy, Hershey's is getting a little help from Microsoft to make its Twizzlers.
title: Hershey's wants to make the perfect Twizzler — so it created a manufacturing system to do just that

description: Microsoft researcher Haiyan Zhang created a watch for Emma Lawton that helps the graphic designer control the symptoms of Parkinson’s disease.
title: ‘My God, it’s better’: Emma can write again thanks to a prototype watch, raising hope for Parkinson’s disease – Transform
